Directed by Ben Stiller. Aoife McArdle.

Written by Dan Erickson. Dan Erickson. Mohamad el Masri. Mohamad el Masri. Anna Ouyang Moench. Anna Ouyang Moench. Wei-Ning Yu. Chris Black. Andrew Colville. Kari Drake. Helen Leigh. Amanda Overton.

Cast Zach Cherry( Dylan 1) . Britt Lower( Helly 1) . Tramell Tillman( Milchick 1) . Jen Tullock( Devon 1) . Dichen Lachman( Ms. Casey 1) . Michael Chernus( Ricken 1) . John Turturro( Irving 1) . Christopher Walken( Burt 1) . Patricia Arquette( Harmony Cobel 1) . Gwendoline Christie(1) . Alia Shawkat(1) . Merritt Wever(1) . John Noble(1) . Robby Benson(1) . Ã“lafur Darri Ã“lafsson(1) . Grace Rex( Rebeck ) . Donald Webber Jr.( Patton ) . Karen Aldridge( Regabhi ) . Anthoula Katsimatides( Florence ) . Ethan Flower( Angelo Arteta ) . Cassidy Layton( June Kilmer ) . Joanne Kelly( Nina ) . James Augustus Lee( Bartender ) . Hudson Flynn( WMC Activist 1 ) . Alexis Cofield( Checkout Girl ) . Olivia Alboher( Woman in Old Woman Mask ) . Alexandra Ferrara( Weather Channel ) . Ruby Stevens( WMC Activist 2 ) . Michael Caiazzo( Lead Singer ) . Brian Rock( Goat Wrangler ) . Samantha Farrow( Woman in Bride Mask ) . Jillian Lindig( Myrtle Eagan ) . Tara Harte-Rodriguez( Choreographer ) . Rajat Suresh( Balf ) . Lou Martini Jr.( Cop ) . Weston Krukow( Man in Sheep’s Head Mask ) . Blaze James Gorman( Dylan’s Son ) . Jonathan Iglesias( Guy at Venue ) . Tye Miller( Guitarist ) . Griffin Stanton-Ameisen( Waiter ) . Charles Henry Wood( Drummer ) . Edward Brence( Jasper (uncredited) ) . Christine Taylor( Sitcom V.0. (uncredited) ) . David Pressman( Sitcom V.O. (uncredited) ) . Doris McCarthy( Restaurant Guest (uncredited) ) . Producers Caroline Baron. Mohamad el Masri. Patricia Arquette. Gerry Robert Byrne. John Cameron. Jackie Cohn. Andrew Colville. Dan Erickson. Jill Footlick. Paul Leonardo Jr.. Aoife McArdle. Amanda Overton. Katie Pruitt. Adam Scott. Ben Stiller. Nicholas Weinstock. Mark Friedman.

Number of Seasons 2

Number of Episodes 19

Status OnGoing (2022–)
